bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext: Description of problem: Package qpid-proton fails to build from source in Fedora rawhide and Fedora 26 with error: cc1plus: error: -Wformat-security ignored without -Wformat [-Werror=format-security] Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 0.17.0-1.fc26 Steps to Reproduce: koji build --scratch f27 qpid-proton-0.17.0-1.fc26.src.rpm Additional info: This package is tracked by Koschei. See: http://apps.fedoraproject.org/koschei/package/qpid-proton Dependency changes since last successful build gcc 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.10.fc26 cpp 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.10.fc26 libgcc 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.10.fc26 libstdc++ 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.10.fc26 libgomp 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.10.fc26 perl-threads-shared 1.54-2.fc26 > 1.55-1.fc26 libnghttp2 1.19.0-2.fc26 > 1.20.0-1.fc26 perl-threads 1:2.12-2.fc26 > 1:2.15-1.fc26 libstdc++-devel 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.10.fc26 gcc-c++ 7.0.1-0.9.fc26 > 7.0.1-0.10.fc26
